sentences.en: And if I calculate kappa to the best of my ability, well, I find that kappa should be K four newton-meters per radian.
sentences.cn: 如果我尽最大能力,算出K值，我会发现,会很接近4*10，very，close，to，four，times，ten，to，the，minus,4，每弧度牛顿米。

sentences.en: CPhase(0.01, x) rotates the phase of the |1> component by one one-hundredth of a radian in the complex plane.
sentences.cn: CPhase(0.01, x) 在复平面内使 |1> 分量的相位转过了百分之一弧度。

sentences.en: Each vertex in average distance of each radian located in circumference.
sentences.cn: 各顶点相互以平均的弧度距离坐落在圆周上.

sentences.en: Excellent radian , beautiful decoration, the artwork of the war!
sentences.cn: 超卓的弧度, 精绝的装饰, 战争的艺术品!

sentences.en: Profile design : graceful arc - radian line. Can be selected screen window. Firm screen and less material.
sentences.cn: 型材设计流线圆弧大方, 可选用带纱窗,纱窗密实,与窗框融为一体,用料更简.

sentences.en: Scientific calculator function calculation, square roots prescription, angle radian calculation, 2, 8, 10,16 between hexadecimal conversion.
sentences.cn: 科学计算器功能,有加减乘除, 平方开方求根, 角度弧度计算, 2 、 8 、 10、16进制间的转换.

sentences.en: The article discussed the nature of far infrared radiant material and its radian mechanism.
sentences.cn: 叙述了远红外辐射性材料的性质及辐射加热机理.

sentences.en: The radian of her graceful neck particularly conquers artists'inspiration.
sentences.cn: 她优雅的长脖子的曲线征服了所有艺术家的灵感.

sentences.en: Thus the adjustment mechanism can meet the requirements of large adjustment range and nano - radian resolution.
sentences.cn: 因此,该角度微调装置能满足大范围调整,纳弧度分辨力的要求.

sentences.en: Using radians is especially easy on graphing calculators that allow you to switch into radian mode.
sentences.cn: 但是弧度特别是在图形计算方面更容易.

sentences.en: W is the radian frequency deviation from the center frequency.
sentences.cn: w是角频率与中心频率的偏离值.

trans.tran_en: an SI unit of plane angle; the angle between two radii of a circle that cut off on the circumference an arc equal in length to the radius
